dependencies.description:
NEURON is a simulation environment for single and networks of neurons.
NEURON is a simulation environment for modeling individual and networks
of neurons. NEURON models individual neurons via the use of sections
that are automatically subdivided into individual compartments, instead
of requiring the user to manually create compartments.
dependencies.name: neuron

dependencies.description:
The Electrophys Feature Extract Library (eFEL) allows neuroscientists to
automatically extract features from time series data recorded from
neurons (both in vitro and in silico). Examples are the action potential
width and amplitude in voltage traces recorded during whole-cell patch
clamp experiments. The user of the library provides a set of traces and
selects the features to be calculated. The library will then extract the
requested features and return the values to the user.
dependencies.name: py-efel

dependencies.description: Clean single-source support for Python 3 and 2
dependencies.name: py-future

dependencies.description: IPython's architecture for parallel and distributed computing.
dependencies.name: py-ipyparallel

dependencies.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.
dependencies.name: py-jinja2

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.
dependencies.name: py-pandas

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
SCOOP (Scalable COncurrent Operations in Python) is a distributed task
module allowing concurrent parallel programming on various environments,
from heterogeneous grids to supercomputers.
dependencies.name: py-scoop

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description: Python library to optimize and evaluate electrical models.
dependent_to.name: py-bluepyemodel
